object.creator: zhong.apex
object.name: vIB_GS_SBCLSH_M
object.package: 101_固收.1_发行前.D-申报材料审核流程
object.describe: 我发起的申报材料审核流程

column.name: LDSP
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/suggestion.sdo?LcbdID="+ID+"&Lcbd=lcib_gs_SBCLSH"+"&Ywlx=120000";
"<iframe id='lc_zyldyj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"

constraint.SQL:
["(NOT EXISTS
 (SELECT 1
 FROM TIB_XMXX T
 WHERE T.XMLX <> 120900 AND T.ID = TIB_XMXX_GS.XMMC) OR EXISTS
 (SELECT 1
 FROM ECIF.LCIB_GS_NHLC T, JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY M
 WHERE T.XMMC = TIB_XMXX_GS.ID AND T.INSTID = M.ID AND M.STATE = 4 AND
 T.BJJG IN (1, 2)))",[]]

["lcIB_GS_LXLC.XMMC={0} AND lcIB_GS_LXLC.BJJG IN (1,2) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY M WHERE M.ID= lcIB_GS_LXLC.InstID AND M.STATE = 4)",[{"expression":"XMMC","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

["lcIB_GS_NHLC.XMMC={0} AND lcIB_GS_NHLC.BJJG IN (1,2) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY M WHERE M.ID= lcIB_GS_NHLC.InstID AND M.STATE = 4)",[{"expression":"XMMC","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

column.name: NHBZS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select t1.NHZY_ZS from ECIF.lcIB_GS_NHLC t1 inner join jgcrm.os_wfentry t2 on t2.id=t1.instid where t2.state=4 and t1.XMMC=? and rownum = 1 order by t1.instid desc",[XMMC])

column.name: NMXXDJB
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/excelOut?ywlx=120000&insid='+InstID+'&lcbd=lcIB_GS_SBCLSH'; '' //'下载'

column.name: DYZNPT
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var procId = 'wfIB_GS_SBCLSH'; var formId = InstID; var url='bss/ibb/nworkflow/nworkflowindex/json/workfolwPushEbscn.sdo?procId='+procId+'&formId='+formId; "调用智能平台(提示:推荐使用chrome浏览器以获得最佳使用体验)"

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_SBCLSH' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_GS_SBCLSH&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_SBCLSH' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'

restrictions.condition: {"statement":"lcIB_GS_SBCLSH.SQR={0} and exists(select 1 from jgcrm.OS_WFENTRY where id=lcIB_GS_SBCLSH.InstID and state<>3) or {0}=0","args":[{"expression":"$Login.User","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}],"type":0}
